div.p: ANTONIO: Throughout this program, we've seen how we're more likely to experience problems if we aren't aware of our biology, and we make high-risk choices.
ANTONIO: Unfortunately, we can't prevent problems of the past, we but can prevent future problems by making low-risk choices.
ANTONIO: It may take a while to get used to our low-risk guidelines, but putting together our own formula is a huge step toward avoiding future problems and protecting the things we care about.
